mapper.select: SELECT fm.* FROM vm_movies_filmmakers_realation r, vm_filmmakers fm, vm_movies m WHERE m.id = r.movie_id AND fm.id = r.filmmaker_id AND m.`status` = 1 AND r.`status` = 1 AND fm.`status` = 1
